issue.title: [CF 968] Adding the ability to distinguish scenarios from other instance types
issue.body:
It would be nice to be able to distinguish between scenarios and 5-mans or higher. Perhaps adding scenarios to instance types or having a condition to check for number of players in group. As a hunter I like my pet growl notification to pop up in dungeons and raids but I actually WANT my pet to tank in most scenarios. Currently setting instance type to ">= 5 players" includes scenarios as well.


> Posted by CurseForge user ookin | Imported from CurseForge issue #968 | Raw
